TopicTitle: Any ideas of when 0.24 might be coming out?

Articles.Content: Does anyone have any idea of when 0.24 will be released? Just curious.
Sometime this year hopefully. But, it could be anytime between Febuary and April.

Asking for release dates is actually forbidden as per [thread=30064]Da Rulz[/thread]. (Section 2.3c, from memory.)

It's out when it's out. There have only been two or three weekly devnotes so far, so they've not even had a single month of development time since 0.23's release (and the holidays and all). Typical dev cycles are approximately three months, but times can and often will vary depending on how stable the build is and how much inside testing has to go on to make it fairly playable. Patience.

Anyway, it's against the rules to ask, so we'll be closing this now.
